title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4107.1 - Disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4107.1 - Disclosure

State Regulations
A racing, farm or stable name may be used by the owners
or lessees of horses. The names of all persons interested in the stable or
operating thereunder and any additions, deletions or changes therein shall be
disclosed to the commission upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4107.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
